name: Fugue in Void (itch)
description:
Artistic audio visual experience

Explore all kind of mysterious places and dive into a world full of atmosphere.

Let this experience unfold in your head. 

Let it inspire you.

This project took me over 6 months and is the result of my creative chaos.

It is my all and everything.

Warning: This game has on purpose no saving system. The experience should be done in one walk-through and takes about 45 minutes. Take your time. Close the curtains and use headphones 

The perfect break from all those action packed games out there.
